website_summaries.verdict: This sleek air purifier and ionizer is great for small, enclosed offices or bedrooms, but it's not as powerful as others in terms of airflow.
pros: Generates UV light to kill bacteria
cons: Does not generate significant levels of negative ions

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one day. Then started a high pitch squeal and a weird smell was emitting from the unit. Super disappointing! Update: the company reached out to explain what the problem might be. They offered a new unit and or a refund. I opted for a refund as I don't want to risk the new unit having the same problem. I amended the star from 1 to a 3 only because their customer service was quick to respond and attempt to help.
customer_reviews.author: jen_muse

customer_reviews.title: Not a serious ionizer.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is ahestetically nice but is not really working, quite disappointing. It is supposed to generate negative ions, I have for years a real ionizer around and what I can say is that no ions are emitted at all. And in fact is not cleaning the air at all. On a real ionizer you can feel the air be moved even without a fan. On this unit, even if the fan is running, is barely possible to "feel" the airflow. I have some doubts about the choice to power the unit with a standard USB charger. I would have choose to start with a higher voltage for the high voltage generator.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano Bodini

customer_reviews.title: works in a cubicle
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my desktop in the corner. It stopped my sneezing. Then i started sneezing again and got all mad until i realized it got unplugged.
customer_reviews.author: daniel kuhn

customer_reviews.title: A good one with affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, elegant design, and works like magic. It may make squeaking noise for the first day or two but very very low frequency squeaky notice. After the first couple days it runs quietly that you don't even know it's running. It helps a lot with my allergy too
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Lam

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MACHINE WITH BLUE RING IN TOP !
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine for our master bedroom i love having on always especially when windows clise & heat or sir on, great fir both heathy & people lije us with medical issues. Blue ring reminds me if my Echo devices .
customer_reviews.author: Fabian G

customer_reviews.title: Runs great.  Air has less dust.
customer_reviews.text: Does just what its supposed to. The fan inside occasionally will make a high pitch whine that most people may not hear.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Whisting Sound Annoying
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work right away at cleaning the air but hours later went to bed and turned it on amd the WHISTLTING sound I read of in other reviews started. Too bad ...loved the look and initial function but cant sleep with it on.Guess i will run it during day to avoid hassle of returning it. Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa Lola

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Needs a small room, not very good in office and it’s small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Small but effective product. Perfect for a bathroom or bedroom. Great customer service. Quiet product
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Swift delivery and quiet operation. Got this for my wife's desk at her office and she is loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Misleading and Inaccurate Product Description - NOT HEPA
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this air purifier because it said in the title and in the description that it is True Hepa. It is not at all. It is an ionizer. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: tamora schoeneberg

customer_reviews.title: Weird high pitched squeak
customer_reviews.text: It keeps making a high pitched squeak sound, is this a common issue?

customer_reviews.title: As soon as I plugged the air purifier in and ...
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I plugged the air purifier in and turned it on, it made a high pitch humming noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for an office. Really does a great job. Air smells better.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice, work good, make my room fresh,like it ,thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ANDY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful; really aids in eliminating allergens in the workplace. This keep my small area in a big office comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tutoringmom

customer_reviews.title: Poor product. Very loud squealing noise.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful. Loud squealing noise when on, if you can get it working.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mcmillan

product_meta.title: DHS SHD Air Purifier with HEPA Filter,Desktop Air Cleaner for Home Room Office
product_meta.description:
Specifications
Host Material: Plastic
Rated Power: ≤ 2.0 W
Noise Level: ≤ 32 dB
Power Source: USB
Net Weight: 1.146 lb (0.52kg)
Dimensions: 4.92×4.92×7.64 in (125×125×194mm)

Package including：
1×Air Purifier
1×High-qulity filter
1×5V USB cable
1×User Manual
1×Mini Clean Brush

Tips:

Only one single filter needs to be replaced every 4-6 months
depending on the use of the product.
Replacement Filter ASIN: B078GQ13RP

NOTE: wood grain design but made from plastic

Package contains mini brush, please use it to clean the brushes on
the edge of the air outlet regularly in case the ionization noise,
which is caused by dust.

Custmer Support
Any issue or question about this Air Purifier, please feel free to
contact us via an E-mail. Our 24 hours online customer service team
will support help at once.
feature_bullets: Advanced HEPA Technology - The filter can remove 99.97% of air impurities, dust, particles, pollen, smell, smoke.
Easy to Operate - This Air Ionizer can produce 5,000,000 negative ions only need one button operation, purification range up to 108 Square feet.
Intelligent Sleep Mode - This air purifier filtration have two mode(normal mode&sleep mode). Entering sleep mode, the unit will automatically turned off after 8 hours.
Nightlight-function - This air purifier can use as a Nightlight to light up your path at night.

Fashion Design - We design this air cleaner unique appearance to make it elegant and stylish, so that it’s a geat choice to decorate your home or office. This is also a fun gift to your lover or friends.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars38 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
